hero.bio: Passionate about building modern web experiences. Focused on React, TypeScript, and performant interfaces.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Development of modern web applications using React, TypeScript and Node.js. Implementation of scalable architectures and maintenance of legacy code. Collaboration with multidisciplinary teams to deliver high-quality products.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Creation of intuitive and responsive user interfaces. Optimization of web performance and improvement of user experience. Work with modern technologies like React, Tailwind CSS and Vite.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Participation in diverse web projects. Learning of best development practices and teamwork. Implementation of designs and functionalities according to client specifications.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Complete e-commerce platform with payment gateway, inventory management and admin panel.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Task management application with real-time collaboration features, notifications and statistics.

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: Tool that allows developers to create custom portfolios using predefined templates.

projects.description: A brief placeholder description to visualize the layout of 5 cards.

projects.description: A brief placeholder description to visualize the layout of 5 cards.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a passionate developer fascinated by technology and innovation. Since an early age, I have been captivated by the world of software development and how it can transform people's lives.
I love learning new technologies and facing complex challenges. In my free time, I contribute to open source projects to learn from the community's knowledge.
My goal is to create applications that not only work well, but also provide an exceptional user experience.

footer.madeWith: Made with React + Vite + Tailwind CSS
